full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: EJ196-240757_Algoma Snow Removal and Landscaping_NCR**

**Tender Announcement Information**

* Date published: November 30, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: January 18, 2024, 14:00:00 EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: May 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: None (TBD)
* Amendment Number: 0
* Solicitation Number: WS4278938242
* Reference Number: WS4278938242-Doc4282819819

**Procurement Details**

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Goods and Services to be Provided: Exterior grounds maintenance services, including snow removal and landscaping services, for Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) at 1170 Algoma Rd, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.

**Site Visit**

* A mandatory site visit will be conducted on December 20, 2023, at 10:30 a.m. Bidders must communicate their attendance intentions and provide the name(s) and date of birth of the person(s) attending by December 14, 2023, at 12:00 p.m. EST.

**Bidding Requirements**

* All bids must be submitted by January 18, 2024, at 14:00:00 EDT. Late bids will not be accepted.
* Bidders must provide all required supporting documentation and bid submission as per the Statement of Work attached at Annex A.

**Contact Information**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Email: [shauna.barrett@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shauna.barrett@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Notice URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18153946?extsite=MTgxNTM5NDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18153946?extsite=MTgxNTM5NDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
